titles: A Trve relation of the proposing, threatning, and perswading the vintners to yeeld to the imposition upon wines declaring the dislike of the generality of retailers, and whatsoever they either did or suffered therein, was meerly by compulsion : and heereby is also truely set forth their great, and almost insupportable losse by this imposition : together with the extreame wrongs and injuries they have suffered in their arreare-money, in their meat-money, and by medium-wine.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
